PetriNet

Interface IPetriNet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetriNet

    public interface IPetriNet
    The interface PetriNet.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ladislas DELLINGER and Alfred PICHARD

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emulate()
      Launch the emulation of the PetriNet.
      void fire(Transition transition)
      Execute the fire method of the Transition class.
      java.util.List<IArc> getArcs()
      Gets the arcs of the PetriNet.
      java.util.List<Transition> getEnabledTransitions()
      Gets enabled transitions.
      void step()
      Fire a random transition if there is one enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • step

        void step()
        Fire a random transition if there is one enabled.

      • fire

        void fire(Transition transition)
        Execute the fire method of the Transition class.

        Can be considered as an alias of the Transtion.fire() method.

        Parameters:
        transition - the transition to fire

      • emulate

        void emulate()
        Launch the emulation of the PetriNet.

        Execute the step() method until there is no more enabled transitions available.

      • getEnabledTransitions

        java.util.List<Transition> getEnabledTransitions()
        Gets enabled transitions.
        Returns:
        a list of the enabled transitions

      • getArcs

        java.util.List<IArc> getArcs()
        Gets the arcs of the PetriNet.
        Returns:
        a list of the arcs of the PetriNet
